name: itvndx

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(citv, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat6))
-| wceq(citv, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat6)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat6), cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ (Itv ` ndx)= cdc(1, 6)
⊣ Itv = Slot(cdc(1, 6))
⊣ cdc(1, 6)∈ ℕ

-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat6), cn)
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ Itv = Slot(cdc(1, 6))
⊣ cdc(1, 6)∈ ℕ

|- wceq(cfv(citv, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat6))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat6), cn)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(nat1, nat6), cn)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat6, cn)

comment: Index value of the Interval (segment) slot. Use ~ ndxarg . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Aug-2017.)
